Hay all ok this is why...

Jam did not have a PB account he was band some time back so I give him my account to upload on.

Why was he band?

Well because we are the admins of torrent-hackers and we spamed hell in to this site to get users about a year back.

Hence why the link is not in the info (PB AUTO REMOVE)

I made torrent-hackers about 15 months back and now we have that running nice we have set up a WOW server.

So with this download you just unrar to C:\Program Files\

Make a account from the link that comes in the folder. Or you can make your account now from here http://www.wowstatus.net/detail.php?server=376447 (As I said befor PB will not allow the full link to torrent-hackers in a comment).

Then all you do is go to the World of Warcraft folder and run the WoW.exe

Note: DONT RUN THE LAUNCHER.exe!

That is it. Nice and simpull.

Have fun!

When you come on tell a GM (The guys that run the server) That you got the game from Pirat bay and you will get 100 Gold.

Once again HAVE FUN AND ENJOY!
